page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: In this area we have 29 farms.Most of the farms grow grass for grazing.The farmers mostly keep sheep,cattle, horses and poultry.The farm with the biggest acreage is Alderley Park Farm which is owned by I.C.I.,it has 132 acres.The smallest acreage is 2 acres at White Barn Farm. Some of the names of the farms are Finlow Hill Farm, Fittontown Farm and Higher House Farm. At Hocker Lane Farm they grow Cheshire potatoes. At Fittontown Farm they grow potatoes,swedes,corn and hay. New House Farm has 3 acres but is not used as a farm any more. All these farms are situated in nice positions in the countryside.Lots of people come walking to the farms with all the animals.
